section.title: WMS layer configuration
section.para: A complete WMS layer configuration looks as follows:
As you can see, the bean class refers to the actual layer type: org.geomajas.layer.wms.WmsLayer.
The layer object contains some extra properties which are specifically tied to the WMS server:

row.entry: The base url of the WMS server. This is the base part (excluding the request parameters) of the url that would be called to execute a WMS request.
Version of the WMS protocol which should be used. Check your server configuration for possible values.
The mime type in which the images should be returned, for example "image/gif". Check your server configuration for possible values.
Some WMS servers support multiple styles for their layers. Check your server configuration for possible values.
You can define additional parameters which can be passed to the WMS server. These are name/value pairs which are passed in org.geomajas.configuration.Parameter objects.
